A true wedding band would not care and would CRUSH it.
That is a genuinely brilliant band name.

“What a wonderful Christian reception you guys just played. Is it rude to ask if you’d be willing to do a Satanic wed—“

WEDDING BAND: “Hail Lucifer. Here’s our card. We get one meal break and we specialize in Journey covers.”

I love how the lead singer goes out of his way to let everyone know the also do Eid, Diwali, bar mitzvahs, Sweet Sixteens and quinceaneras. Wedding bands are the most aggressively non-denominational groups on the planet.

Iman Vellani and Tom Holland are both so charming & real in their respective roles. I’d watch a hand-held, low budget @marvel short about Kamala Khan & Peter Parker following @kathleenhanna around Brooklyn trying to get a selfie with her.
@Questergirl @KurloznBlacktor GOOSEberry preserves

The new ep of @msmarvel has a wedding scene has very little to do with the overall story but is such pure bliss (moms & aunties being goofy, dads being embarrassing), movement, music and color that you don’t care. Lands better than most fight sequences.
Way to go, Keri! 💯💯💯

This series has been so quietly amazing, and the recent turns (and brilliant leaps forward in time) are mind-bending. I wanna go re-read it from the beginning — stuff is paying off 50 issues in that was clearly set up from the get-go.
@SuperCaruso Yeah go ahead!
This movie is such a complete, obsessive piece of art but yeah, I was not able to do it one sitting. Frequent breaks. It’s…something else. Harryhausen on PCP. #MadGod
